results_employee_type_unknown.help: If the employee type is unknown while we're generating a response (unlikely), use this to replace the token "{{employee_type}}" wherever it appears in the response text

results_employee_type_a.help: If the employee type selected is A (nanny), use this to replace the token "{{employee_type}}" wherever it appears in the response text

results_employee_type_b.help: If the employee type selected is B (house cleaner), use this to replace the token "{{employee_type}}" wherever it appears in the response text

results_employee_type_c.help: If the employee type selected is C (home attendant), use this to replace the token "{{employee_type}}" wherever it appears in the response text

results_employee_type_d.help: If the employee type selected is D (home health care worker), use this to replace the token "{{employee_type}}" wherever it appears in the response text

results_resources_pssl_e5642f77.help: The link text for [this NYS Sick, PFL, and DB resource](https://www1.nyc.gov/site/dca/about/paid-sick-leave-domestic-workers.page)

results_main_header.help: The main header for the results page

results_no_benefits.help: This section appears if we don't have any benefit responses. If `{{employee_type}}}` appears in the text, it will be replaced by the type selected.

results_intro.help: This section appears before the benefit responses, but only if we have some to show. If `{{employee_type}}}` appears in the text, it will be replaced by the type selected.

results_off_the_books_partial_header.help: The header for the text that appears if they selected "Yes, partially" in response to the on-the-books question. If `{{employee_type}}}` appears in the text, it will be replaced by the type selected.

results_off_the_books_partial_text.help: The text that appears if they selected "Yes, partially" in response to the on-the-books question, explaining why they should come into full compliance. If `{{employee_type}}}` appears in the text, it will be replaced by the type selected.

results_benefit_short_pssl_agency_a_empl.help:
This answer appears under NYC PSSL for the following scenario:

* [agency] YES
* [employed] ONE YEAR OR MORE and OVER 80

If `{{employee_type}}}` appears in the text, it will be replaced by the type selected.

results_benefit_long_pssl_agency_a_emplo.help:
This expanded answer appears under NYC PSSL for the following scenario:

* [agency] YES
* [employed] ONE YEAR OR MORE and OVER 80

If `{{employee_type}}}` appears in the text, it will be replaced by the type selected.

results_benefit_short_cares_agency_a_boo.help:
This answer appears under CARES Act: UI Benefits for the following scenario:

* [agency] YES
* [books] PARTIALLY or NO
* [length of employment] LESS THAN SIX MONTHS

If `{{employee_type}}}` appears in the text, it will be replaced by the type selected.

results_benefit_long_cares_agency_a_book.help:
This expanded answer appears under CARES Act: UI Benefits for the following scenario:

* [agency] YES
* [books] PARTIALLY or NO
* [length of employment] LESS THAN SIX MONTHS

If `{{employee_type}}}` appears in the text, it will be replaced by the type selected.
